mn124:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā bākulo rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
mn124:3.3: Atha kho acelakassapo āyasmato bākulassa purāṇagihisahāyo yenāyasmā bākulo tenupasaṅkami;
mn124:3.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn124:3.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho acelakassapo āyasmantaṃ bākulaṃ etadavoca:
mn124:4.3: “Imehi pana te, āvuso bākula, asītiyā vassehi katikkhattuṃ methuno dhammo paṭisevito”ti?
mn124:4.4: “Na kho maṃ, āvuso kassapa, evaṃ pucchitabbaṃ:
mn124:4.5: ‘imehi pana te, āvuso bākula, asītiyā vassehi katikkhattuṃ methuno dhammo paṭisevito’ti.
mn124:4.6: Evañca kho maṃ, āvuso kassapa, pucchitabbaṃ:
mn124:4.7: ‘imehi pana te, āvuso bākula, asītiyā vassehi katikkhattuṃ kāmasaññā uppannapubbā’”ti?
mn124:5.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi kāmasaññaṃ uppannapubbaṃ”.
mn124:5.2: “Yampāyasmā bākulo asītiyā vassehi nābhijānāti kāmasaññaṃ uppannapubbaṃ idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema”. (1)
mn124:6.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi byāpādasaññaṃ …
mn124:6.4: “Yampāyasmā bākulo asītiyā vassehi nābhijānāti vihiṃsāsaññaṃ uppannapubbaṃ, idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema”.
mn124:7.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi kāmavitakkaṃ uppannapubbaṃ”.
mn124:7.2: “Yampāyasmā bākulo asītiyā vassehi nābhijānāti kāmavitakkaṃ uppannapubbaṃ, idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema”. (4)
mn124:8.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi byāpādavitakkaṃ …
mn124:8.4: “Yampāyasmā bākulo asītiyā vassehi nābhijānāti vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ uppannapubbaṃ, idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema”.
mn124:9.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi gahapaticīvaraṃ sāditā”.
mn124:9.2: “Yampāyasmā bākulo asītiyā vassehi nābhijānāti gahapaticīvaraṃ sāditā, idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema”. (7)
mn124:10.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi satthena cīvaraṃ chinditā”.
mn124:10.2: “Yampāyasmā bākulo asītiyā vassehi nābhijānāti satthena cīvaraṃ chinditā …
mn124:11.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi sūciyā cīvaraṃ sibbitā …
mn124:11.12: nābhijānāmi mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desitā antamaso catuppadampi gāthaṃ …
mn124:12.1: “Asīti me, āvuso, vassāni pabbajitassa nābhijānāmi gāmantasenāsane vassaṃ upagantā”.
mn124:12.2: “Yampāyasmā bākulo asītiyā vassehi nābhijānāti gāmantasenāsane vassaṃ upagantā, idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema”. (34)
mn124:13.1: “Sattāhameva kho ahaṃ, āvuso, saraṇo raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjiṃ;
mn124:13.3: Yampāyasmā bākulo sattāhameva saraṇo raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñji;
mn124:13.4: atha aṭṭhamiyaṃ aññā udapādi idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema. (35)
mn124:14.1: Labheyyāhaṃ, āvuso bākula, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
mn124:14.2: Alattha kho acelakassapo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
mn124:14.3: Acirūpasampanno panāyasmā kassapo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
mn124:14.4: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
mn124:14.5: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
mn124:14.6: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
mn124:14.7: Aññataro kho panāyasmā kassapo arahataṃ ahosi.
mn124:15.1: Atha kho āyasmā bākulo aparena samayena avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn124:15.4: “Yampāyasmā bākulo avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn124:15.6: ajja me parinibbānaṃ bhavissatī’ti, idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhārema”. (36)
mn124:16.1: Āyasmā bākulo majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnakova parinibbāyi.
mn124:16.2: “Yampāyasmā bākulo majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnakova parinibbāyi, idampi mayaṃ āyasmato bākulassa acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhāremā”ti. (37)
